name: Groabia Times
description:
Its a Point and Click, single-player game about morality and misinformation. 

Premise

You are Michal Holič, the director of a journalism team, working for Groabia Times. Your duty is to inform people. You can give orders to your team members so everything go as planned.

Your superiors will praise and reward you if everything goes alright. Else, you will be fined, or worse. Pay attention to your bank account, you never know when you will get sick, or someone you love. Manage your economy properly, please, our nation needs you.

Platform & Monetization 

A premium game for PC, at $2.99 

Audience 

13yo+

Credits

Aylan Miranda: Programming

Mariana Navarro: 2D art. 

Alberto Aponte:Music and sound
